results.title_name_en: PRUwealth Serier - Application Form for Policy Surrender / Withdrawal of Cash Value of Policy Account
results.title_name_tc: 盈利寶系列-退保/提取保單戶口之現金價值申請表格
results.content_en:
er and withdrawal of cash value within the first 5 policy years. 以下提取費用適用於首5個
保單年之退保及保單戶口現金價值提取:
● Within 1st year 第一年內 - 8%
● Within 2nd year 第二年內 - 6%
● Within 3rd year 第三年內 - 4%
●
Within 4th year 第四年內 - 2%
● Within 5th year 第五年內 - 1%
5. If no reason selected for policy cancellation, it would be considered as "Unwilling to disclose reason". 如沒有選擇相關申請原因,將被視為「不願意
披露理由」。
00000000
Prudential Hong Kong Limited 保誠保險有限公司
Part of Prudential plc (United Kingdom) 保誠集團成員
PDD/PAIPPW (06/25)
1/5
PAIPPW0401Part 1 第一部分 Policy Surrender / Withdrawal of Cash Value 退保/提取現金價值指示
I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低
退保價值/保單戶口價值,從而反映有關保單旗下資產的變動。
Requested Effective Date # :
要求生效日期:
Day 日
/
/
Month 月
Year年
# Leave this blank unless you have specific request on the effective date of
change. Prudential shall have the right to determine the effective date of
change upon acceptance of the Application. 如對更改生效日期沒有特別
要求,不用填寫此欄。於接受更改申請時,保誠有權決定更改之
生效日期。
Withdraw Cash Value of Policy Account (Cheque Amount) 提取保單戶口現金價值(支票金額)
USD/HKD 美元 /港元
Surrender 退保
Reason for Surrender (Please choose ONE appropriate answer) 申請退保原因(請選擇一個最適當的答案)
Change in Insurance needs 保險需求有所改變
Change in financial condition 財務狀況改變
Replaced by another insurance plan 以其他保險產品取代
Returns below expectations 保單回報未如理想
Coverage not comprehensive 保障不夠全面
Payment tenor is too long 付款期過長
Urgent need of Money 急需用錢
Lost confidence in the economy and future 對前景及經濟失去信心
Residing overseas 移居外地
Other Reason 其他理由
Unwilling to disclose reason 不願意披露理由
Part 2 第二部分 Payment Instruction 付款指示
1. All payments would be issued by cheque and in the name of the policyowner. For policy with collateral assignment, please state the payee of the cheque.
所有款項將以支票直接給予保單持有人。如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票抬頭人。
2. If no payment option is selected, payment will be issued in HKD cheque. 如沒有選擇付款方式,款項會以港元支票簽發。
3. The cheque will be posted to the policyowner's correspondence address in Prudential's by registered mail, unless otherwise specify in the "Delivery Option"
below. 除在以下註明遞交方式,支票將會以掛號形式郵寄到保單持有人在保誠記錄上的通訊地址。
4. If the policyowner selects to collect the cheque at a branch of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited (SCB) or at our Customer Service Centre(CSC),
please specify the SCB branch code, or the CSC location and policyowner's contact number. 如選擇到渣打銀行(香港)有限公司分行或本公司客戶
服務中心領取,請註明分行編號,或客戶服務中心地點及保單持有人聯絡號碼。
Payment Option 付款方式
HKD Cheque 港元支票
(Applicable to USD / HKD Policy 適用於美元及港元保單)
Local USD Cheque 本地美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
Overseas USD Cheque 海外美元支票
(Applicable to USD Policy 適用於美元保單)
For Policy with collateral assignee, please state the payee of the cheque 如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票收款人
Policyowner 保單持有人
Collateral Assignee 抵押轉讓之承讓人
Delivery Option 遞交方式
Posted to Policyowner's correspondence address in our record. 郵寄到保單持有人在本公司記錄上的通訊地址
Collect at SCB Branch 親身到渣打銀行分行領取
Approved by BM / BSM:
Branch Code 分行編號
Policyowner's contact number 保單持有人聯絡號碼:
Collect at Prudential Customer Service Centre 親身到保誠客戶服務中心領取
Location 地點:
Policyowner's contact number 保單持有人聯絡號碼:
Signing No.
2/5
PAIPPW0402
00000000
PDD/PAIPPW (06/25)

results.title_name_en: Means of Premium Payment (For Macau branch)
results.title_name_tc: 付款形式 (適用於澳門分行)
results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer
您可以使用電匯以保單貨幣 ** 匯款至 You may pay premium by telegraphic transfer
相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °
the premium payment. For details, please
contact your financial consultant or visit
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt-en.
?其他繳款辦法 Other Payment Instructions
請瀏覽 www.prudential.com.mo 以了解詳情。
Please visit www.prudential.com.mo for details.
親臨繳費處付款 Payment in person at cashier # ▲
閣下可攜同繳費通知書前往本公司之繳費 You can bring along the Premium Notice and
處以下列方法付款。
make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,
您不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至您的理財顧
問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司
繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.

書(澳門適用)

make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金

120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,

問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司

USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,

should pay directly at our cashier.

票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保

月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致

戶提供有關證明文件。

Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the

relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.

results.title_name_en: Means of Premium Payment (For Macau branch)
results.title_name_tc: 付款形式 (適用於澳門分行)
results.content_en:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer
您可以使用電匯以保單貨幣 ** 匯款至 You may pay premium by telegraphic transfer
相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °
the premium payment. For details, please
contact your financial consultant or visit
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt-en.
?其他繳款辦法 Other Payment Instructions
請瀏覽 www.prudential.com.mo 以了解詳情。
Please visit www.prudential.com.mo for details.
親臨繳費處付款 Payment in person at cashier # ▲
閣下可攜同繳費通知書前往本公司之繳費 You can bring along the Premium Notice and
處以下列方法付款。
make payment at our cashier using one of the
following methods.
現金
每份保單每期繳費的交易金額上限為
120,000港元/123,700澳門元/15,000美元
或等值。為保障您的利益,繳付費用時,
您不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至您的理財顧
問。如您欲以現金繳費,建議親臨本公司
繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)

繳費處直接辦理。
Cash
Maximum HKD 120,000 / MOP 123,700 /
USD 15,000 or equivalent per payment
installment per policy. To protect your interest,
you should not pass cash or transfer funds
to your financial consultant when making
payment. If you prefer to pay in cash, you
should pay directly at our cashier.
劃線支票/銀行本票/匯票 **
只接受澳門本地銀行發出的港元*劃線支
票/銀行本票/匯票繳費,抬頭請寫上「保
誠保險有限公司」。如閣下於過去12個
月曾使用銀行本票/匯票支付保費及累計
金額超過120,000港元或以上,須付上相
關的資金來源證明文件。有關資金來源証
明文件的詳情,請聯絡您的理財顧問或致
電客戶服務熱線。保誠保留權利以要求客
戶提供有關證明文件。
Crossed cheque/cashier order/bank draft **
Only accept HKD* crossed Cheque/cashier
order/bank draft issued by banks in Macau
made payable to "Prudential Hong Kong
Limited". If you have paid premium by cashier
order/bank draft in the past 12 months and the
total amount exceeds HKD 120,000 or above,
relevant supporting documents for the source
of funds must be provided. Please contact your
financial consultant or call our customer service
hotline for details of the supporting documents.
Prudential reserves the right to request for the
related supporting documents from customers.
信用卡/銀聯卡
請注意,本公司不接受以信用卡/銀聯卡繳
付「續保保費」、「保單更改」、「償還
貸款」及「在保單保費儲蓄戶口的預繳保
費」。
Credit Card/UnionPay Card
Please note that we do not accept payment
by credit card for "Renewal Premium", "Policy
Change", "Loan Repayment" and "Advance
Premium into Premium Deposit Account
(PDA)".
保誠可能隨時更改繳費安排而毋須事先通知。詳情請瀏覽本公司網頁。
Prudential may change payment arrangement anytime without prior notice. For details,
please visit our corporate website.
註 Note:
*
請預留三個工作天予本公司處理有關付款。Please allow 3 working days for payment processing.
** 付款貨幣受個別計劃之條款及細則所規限。Currency for payment is subject to the terms and conditions of individual product.
# 恕不接受以海外支票/銀行本票/匯票繳費。Making payment via overseas cheque/cashier's order/bank draft is not accepted.
▲ 由第三者付款的繳費方式恕不獲接受,除非付款人為保單持有人之直系親屬或指定人士類別,並連同付款人及保單持有人所簽署的「第三者付款聲明書」一併提交。如第
三者款項超過指定金額,第三者付款人必須遞交相關的證明文件。Payment by a third party is not accepted unless the payor is an immediate family member of the policyowner or
person(s) in the specified categories, and the payment is submitted together with a "Third Party Payment Declaration Form" signed by both the payor and the policyowner. If the third party
payment is over designated amount, the payor has to submit the related supporting documents.
(10 / 2024)
results.content_chunk:
繳費辦法 Payment Instructions
請使用下列辦法直接繳付費用。港元保單只接受港元/澳門元付款。外幣保單可接受以保單貨幣或港元/澳門元付款。非港元保單之付款貨幣受個別繳費方法之條款及細則所規限。
請參閱各繳費方法可接受的付款貨幣。若 閣下以港元/澳門元支付外幣保單及以非支票方式付款,交易金額將按交易日適用的匯率折算為保單貨幣等值金額結算。若 閣下以港元
支票付款,將按保誠收到支票當日的適用匯率換算成保單貨幣的等值金額結算。請瀏覽prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac以獲取不同貨幣的現行匯率。為保障 閣下的利益,
繳付費用時, 閣下不應該將現金轉交或轉賬至 閣下的理財顧問。與此同時,請參閱本公司網頁所刊登之私隱政策。
Please make payments to us directly using the payment methods listed below. For HKD policies, payments can only be made in HKD/MOP. For policies denominated in foreign currencies, payments
can be made in either the policy currency or HKD/MOP. The payment currency of non-HKD policies is subject to the terms and conditions of the individual payment methods. Please refer to the
acceptable payment currencies for each payment method. If you pay for a foreign currency policy in HKD/MOP by non-cheque payment, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable
exchange rate on the transaction date and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. If you pay by cheque in HKD, the transaction amount will be settled at the applicable exchange
rate at on the day of receipt by Prudential and converted into the equivalent amount of policy currency. Please visit prudential.com.hk/exchange-rates-mac-en for our prevailing exchange rate in
different currencies. To protect your interest, you should not pass cash or transfer funds to your financial consultant when making payment. In addition, please visit our privacy policy published in our
corporate website.
3 自動轉賬 Autopay^
閣下可以設立銀行戶口自動轉賬或更改
自動轉賬戶口繳費。請
● 聯絡 閣下之理財顧問或
● 於 www.prudential.com.mo
(澳門>下載中心>更改保單付款
資料)下載的銀行戶口直接付款授權
書(澳門適用)
由於設立自動轉賬需時21天,請將授權
書及預繳保費的支票郵寄至本公司辦理
相關手續(地址:澳門郵政總局郵政信
箱3093號)。
You can set up a bank account autopay or change
autopay account to settle payment. Please
· contact your financial consultant or
· visit www.prudential.com.mo
(Macau > Download library > Update of
Policy Payment Details) for downloading
appropriate Bank Account Direct Debit
Authorization Form (for Macau).
As it takes 21 days to set up the direct debit
authorization, please send the form and the
cheque for advanced payment to us by mail for
processing (Address: P.O. Box 3093, General Post
Office, Macau).
$
電滙 Telegraphic Transfer

相應貨幣的銀行戶口繳交保費。請預 in policy currency ** to the bank account in
留至少七個工作天以處理有關款項。 the corresponding currency. Please allow
詳情請聯絡 閣下的理財顧問或前往 at least seven working days for processing
pruhk.co/payment-mac-tt °

results.title_name_en: Administration Fee for credit card payment
results.title_name_tc: 有關信用卡繳付保費的行政費事宜
results.content_en:
在有須要時或會作出收
費調整。
4. 為何行政費僅適用於銀聯卡而非Visa或Master咭?
● 各個繳費渠道所須的結構維護成本及開支並不相同,而我們亦只會在有須要時才收取相
關行政費。
5. 行政費用收費有沒有上限?
● 行政費用將以客戶的相關付款金額之1.2%為準。
6. 保險經紀/獨立理財顧問公司/公司代理人可否為客人繳付行政費?
● 不可以。保險經紀/獨立理財顧問公司/公司代理人在任何情況下均不應向客戶支付1.2%行政
費。
7. 有否其他不用收取行政費用的繳費渠道?
● 客戶可透過多種其他方式繳費,詳情請參閱保費通知書背頁內之列載。
8. 現時UPOP(以銀聯借記卡/信用卡透過myPrudential於網上繳費)交易最高上限為多
少 ?
● 單筆交易限額及日累計交易限額可能因應個別銀行的條款及細則而有所不同,詳情可參
考中國銀聯卡支付限額https://static.95516.com/static/help/detail_38.html 或自行與發
卡銀行查詢。
● 交易金額上限可能因應發卡銀行政策或監管要求之變動而隨時更改,恕不另行通知。
只供內部使用及傳閱,請勿對外傳閱September 2016
(Broker version)
Updates on Payment of Renewal Premium
Q&A (updated version)
PRUDENTIAL
英 國 保 誠
1. Why is there an administration fee of 1.2% of the payment amount for all renewal premium
payment using UnionPay card effective from 1 August 2016?
· The administration fee is primarily used for covering structural maintenance costs and expenses
of the related payment channel.
2. Why is it 1.2%?
. The fee determined is based on the structural maintenance costs and expenses of the related
payment channel.
3. Will the administration fee be further adjusted in the future?
. We will regularly review the costs and expenses for the structural maintenance of the related
payment channel, and we may from time to time adjust the fee as appropriate.
4. Why the administration fee only applies on UnionPay card but not VISA or MASTER card?
. The required maintenance costs and expenses vary by payment channels and we will only
charge an administration fee when necessary.
5. Is there any upper limit for the administration fee?
. The administration fee will be 1.2% of the related payment amount that the customer should
pay.
6. Can Insurance Broker / IFA Company / Company Agent pay the administration fee for
customer?
. No. Insurance Broker / IFA Company / Company Agent should not pay the administration fee
for customer in any circumstances.
7. Is there any other payment method which does not incur administration fee?
· A wide range of other payment options are also available. Please refer to the back page of the
premium notice for details.
8. What is the maximum transaction limit for the UPOP (UnionPay Online Payment via
myPrudential)?
. The maximum daily limit and transaction limit may vary depending on the terms and conditions
specified by respective banks. Please refer to the China UnionPay Card payment limit table for details
or contact your card issuing banks.
https://static.95516.com/static/help/detail_38.html
. The transaction limits may be subject to changes according to updates on policies of card
issuing banks and regulatory requirements without prior notice.
只供內部使用及傳閱,請勿對外傳閱

results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
英 國
保 誠本
1
Consultant's Name
顧問姓名:

Proposal / Policy Number(s)
申請書編號/保單號碼:
Life Proposed / Life Assured's Name
受保人姓名:
Application Form for Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項申請表
Automatic Premium Loan Option
自動保費貸款選項
Declaration
聲明
I request to apply Automatic Premium Loan clause to the policy which the amount of premium or premium and levy shall be automatically
deemed to be paid by a premium loan and extend to the premium(s) or premium(s) and levy(ies) for any supplementary benefit(s) when the
Plan is paid up.
本人申請應用自動保費貸款條文於此保單,即保費或保費及徵費將自動以貸款的形式繳交,並延續條文於本計劃已繳清所有保費時的附加保障之保費
或保費及徵費。
I declare that I have read and confirm understanding of the important notes below.
本人在此聲明本人已閱讀並確認明白下列注意事項之內容。
Important Notes
注意事項
1. We shall charge you interest on the Automatic Premium Loan(s) starting from the date when the respective Automatic Premium Loan(s)
is incurred. We shall determine the interest rate charged on the Automatic Premium Loan(s).
本公司將會由自動保費貸款日期開始收取自動保費貸款的利息,有關利率將由本公司釐訂。
2. The policy will be automatically terminated once the total outstanding loan amount (including interest) owing to us under your policy
exceeds stated percentage on Policy Contract of the guaranteed cash value of your policy minus all Advanced Claims being paid and / or
payable of this Plan.
本計劃將在 閣下的保單所欠本公司之未償還總金額(包括利息)超過合約訂明比率之保單保證現金價值扣除於本計劃須支付及/或已付訖的預
支賠償總額時立即終止。
I/We declare that I/we have read and confirm understanding of the above content.
本人/吾等在此聲明本人/吾等已閱讀並確認明白上述之內容。
Day
日
Month
月
Year
年
Signature of Proposer / Policyowner
(if other than the Life Proposed / Life
Assured)
投保人/保單持有人簽署(如投保人/保單持有
人與受保人同為一人,可免簽署此欄)
Signature of Life Proposed / Life Assured
(who has attained age 18 or above)
受保人簽署(適用於十八歲或以上的受保人)
Signature of Consultant as Witness
顧問 ( 即見證人 ) 簽署
Name 姓名:
Two witnesses are required if signature chop or fingerprint is used to sign. 若以圖章蓋印或指紋簽署,須有兩位見證人。
Please DO NOT sign on BLANK form. 請勿在空白表格上簽署。
Prudential Hong Kong Limited (A member of Prudential plc group)
保誠保險有限公司(英國保誠集團成員)

er and withdrawal of cash value within the first 5 policy years. 以下提取費用適用於首5個

PDD/PAIPPW (06/25)

PAIPPW0401Part 1 第一部分 Policy Surrender / Withdrawal of Cash Value 退保/提取現金價值指示
I understand and consent that after deducting all other relevant redemption charges as listed above (if applicable), the surrender value / policy account value
will be reduced by the percentage of MVA based on the receipt date of this fully completed form with the required supporting documents by Prudential. I further
understand that the MVA, when applied, reduces the surrender value / policy account value to reflect the market value movement
of the underlying assets of the captioned policy. 本人明白及同意在扣除上表所列之提取費用後(如適用),退保價值/保單戶口價值須減去有關
市場價值調整金額,該金額將以保誠收到此完全填妥表格及相關文件當日之百分比計算;本人並明白保誠行使市場價值調整將會調低
退保價值/保單戶口價值,從而反映有關保單旗下資產的變動。
Requested Effective Date # :
要求生效日期:
Day 日
/
/

Year年

change. Prudential shall have the right to determine the effective date of
change upon acceptance of the Application. 如對更改生效日期沒有特別
要求,不用填寫此欄。於接受更改申請時,保誠有權決定更改之
生效日期。

USD/HKD 美元 /港元
Surrender 退保
Reason for Surrender (Please choose ONE appropriate answer) 申請退保原因(請選擇一個最適當的答案)
Change in Insurance needs 保險需求有所改變
Change in financial condition 財務狀況改變
Replaced by another insurance plan 以其他保險產品取代
Returns below expectations 保單回報未如理想
Coverage not comprehensive 保障不夠全面
Payment tenor is too long 付款期過長
Urgent need of Money 急需用錢
Lost confidence in the economy and future 對前景及經濟失去信心
Residing overseas 移居外地
Other Reason 其他理由
Unwilling to disclose reason 不願意披露理由
Part 2 第二部分 Payment Instruction 付款指示
1. All payments would be issued by cheque and in the name of the policyowner. For policy with collateral assignment, please state the payee of the cheque.
所有款項將以支票直接給予保單持有人。如保單已作抵押轉讓,請指示支票抬頭人。
2. If no payment option is selected, payment will be issued in HKD cheque. 如沒有選擇付款方式,款項會以港元支票簽發。
3. The cheque will be posted to the policyowner's correspondence address in Prudential's by registered mail, unless otherwise specify in the "Delivery Option"
below. 除在以下註明遞交方式,支票將會以掛號形式郵寄到保單持有人在保誠記錄上的通訊地址。
4. If the policyowner selects to collect the cheque at a branch of Standard Chartered Bank (Hong Kong) Limited (SCB) or at our Customer Service Centre(CSC),
please specify the SCB branch code, or the CSC location and policyowner's contact number. 如選擇到渣打銀行(香港)有限公司分行或本公司客戶
服務中心領取,請註明分行編號,或客戶服務中心地點及保單持有人聯絡號碼。

results.content_en:
Change of Payment Mode and Direct Debit Authorization Form
- Bank Account (BOC Macau Branch/BOC Macau)
更改繳費方式及直接付款授權書 -
銀行戶口(中國銀行澳門分行/中國銀行澳門)
Please darken the appropriate circle. 請塗黑適當的選項。 Correct form 正確方式為:
PRUDENTIAL
保 誠 保險 $:
MO
Policy Number
保單號碼
Name of Policyowner
保單持有人姓名
Name of Life Assured
受保人姓名
Name of Financial Consultant
理財顧問姓名
Financial Consultant Contact No.
理財顧問聯絡電話號碼
Financial Consultant Code
理財顧問編號
Division Code & Branch Office
分區編號及分行地點
Important Notes 重要提示:
1. Please complete in BLOCK LETTERS. 請以正楷填寫。
2. Please return to Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) ("Prudential") within 30 days after signing this form. 請於簽署此表格後30天內交回保誠
保險有限公司(澳門分行)
(「保誠」)處理。
3. Please do not sign on blank or incomplete form. 請勿在空白表格或尚未填妥的表格上簽署。
4. Any changes or amendments in this form must be countersigned by the Policyowner in full signature. 保單持有人必須在此表格內任何更改或修改的
地方簽署作實。
5. Policyowner MUST sign and date in Part 4 of this form. 保單持有人必須在此表格第四部分簽署及填寫簽署日期。
6. Please pay 2 premium installment in advance as it takes 45 days for the Direct Debit Authorization to set up. 設立直接付款授權需時45天,請預付2期保費。
7. Upon completion of this Direct Debit Authorization set up request, the payment method will be defaulted to autopay via bank account, and the existing autopay
arrangement, if any, will be stopped immediately. 完成設立直接付款授權申請後,保單之繳費方法將自動設定為銀行戶口自動轉賬,而原有的
自動轉賬設定(如有)會即時終止。
8. Please complete the form in appropriate position as instructed, any information written in non-designated blank spaces will not be processed. S R # Itt
表格之指示於適當的位置填寫資料,於其他非指定空白位置填寫的資料恕不受理。
9. Prudential shall have the right to reject this form if you fail to fulfil Prudential's requirements. 若閣下未能符合保誠的有關規定,保誠有權拒絕此
表格。
10. Receipt of this form by Financial Consultants does not constitute receipt by Prudential. 理財顧問收到此表格並不代表保誠亦已收到。
11. In any circumstances, a person who is not a party to the above policy (including but not limited to the Life Assured or the Beneficiary) has no right to enforce
any of the terms of the above policy. 任何不是上述保單某一方的人士或實體(包括但不限於受保人或受益人),在任何情況下均不能強制
執行上述保單的任何條款。
Part 1a 第一部分 甲部 Direct Debit Authorization and Declaration 直接付款授權和聲明
I/ We hereby authorize Bank of China Macau Branch / Bank of China (Macau) (hereinafter referred to as "the Bank") to effect transfers from my/ our account
specified below to the account of Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) ("Prudential"), details of which specified below, such sum of sums as Prudential
may from time to time advise the Bank. This authorization shall remain valid until further notice.
I/ We further agree that:
本人/吾等茲授權中國銀行澳門分行/中國銀行(澳門)(以下簡稱 貴銀行),根據保誠保險有限公司(澳門分行)(「保誠」)不時給予
貴銀行之指示,在本人/吾等於 貴銀行開立之賬戶(賬戶號碼附誌如下)內支取款項,轉賬予保誠之賬戶以繳付有關費用,直至另行書
面通知為止。本人/吾等知悉遵守下述條款辦理:
1. The Bank may effect transfers from my/our said account such sum or sums as advised by Prudential at any time with immediate effect. $R 1T ## F1 ( apt Ég
付款通知即可支付,款項按保誠所提供之金額扣除。
2. Under no circumstances shall the Bank be held responsible for any consequence(s) as a result of unsuccessful transfer of fund(s) from my/our said account.
如該賬款未能自本人/吾等之銀行賬戶內支付,一切責任及後果,概與 貴銀行無涉。
3. Any variation or cancellation of this authorization has to be given by notice in writing. This authorization shall remain valid unless such notice is given to and
received by the Bank. For 6 consecutive times, transfers are not effected due to no sufficient available fund in my/our said account, the Bank may at its own
discretion not to comply with or act further with this authorization without notice to me/us. 如有任何令授權書失效之變更,本人/吾等必須書面
通知 貴銀行。貴銀行在收到書面通知前,本授權書繼續有效。但如本人/吾等之銀行賬戶達續六次因賬戶可用餘額不足而未能支付
賬款,則貴銀行可有權不經通知而撤銷此項授權。
4. Service charge of the Bank will be debited from my/our said account. 貴銀行有權徵收服務費用,並可由本人/吾等之銀行賬戶內支付。
5. The Bank may disclose details of my/our said account to any other third party if the Bank finds it necessary and appropriate. 貴銀行認為必要和適當時,
不必通知或取得本人/吾等同意有權將有關的賬戶資料披露給其他機構。
6. The Bank shall be entitled to convert the sum or sums to be transferred to the account of Prudential into HKD at a rate determined by the Bank. If the
policy currency is HKD, the premium will be settled in HKD directly. If the policy currency is in USD, the HKD amount will be converted to USD for settlement.
本人/ 吾等授權 貴銀行可根據自動扣賬當天 貴銀行所指定的匯率將轉賬款項兌換成港元以轉賬予保誠之帳戶。如保單貨幣為港元,
保費會直接以港元結算。如保單貨幣為美元,有關港元金額會兌換為美元以作結算。
7. The Bank shall not be obliged to ascertain whether or not notice of any such transfer has been given to me/us. 本人 / 吾等同意 貴銀行無義務確定該等
支款通知是否已交予本人/吾等。
8. Full responsibility for any overdraft (or increase in existing overdraft) on my/our account which may arise as a result of any such transfer(s) shall be jointly
and severally accepted by me/us. 本人 / 吾等願共同及各別承擔因該等支款而令本人/吾等之銀行賬戶出現透支(或令現時透支增加)之
全部責任。
Prudential Hong Kong Limited (Macau Branch) 保誠保險有限公司(澳門分行)
Part of Prudential plc (United Kingdom) 保誠集團成員

results.content_en:
hapter 282 of the laws of Hong Kong)
"Pneumoconiosis and Mesothelioma"
Have the same meaning as assigned to those expressions in the Pneumoconiosis
and Mesothelioma (Compensation) Ordinance (Chapter 360 of the laws of Hong
Kong).
"Geographical Area"
For the purpose of Section VI geographical area means the territory of Hong Kong.
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requesed to read this Policy. If any error or mis-description be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.
5"Damage/ Damage to Shop Contents/ Property/ Safe or Strongroom/ Shop
Premises/ Building/ Land or Structure"
Property damage covered under this Insurance shall mean physical damage to
the substance of property. Physical damage to the substance of property shall
not include damage to date or software in particular any detrimental change in
date software or computer programs that is caused by a deletion a corruption or a
deformation of the original structure.
Consequently the following are exclude from this Insurance:
a) loss of or damage to data or software in particular any detrimental change in
data software or computer programs that is caused by a deletion a corruption
or a deformation of the original structure and any business interruption losses
resulting from such loss or damage. Notwithstanding this Definition loss of
or damage to data or software which is the direct consequence of Insured
physical damage to the substance of property shall be covered.
b)
loss or damage resulting from an impairment in the function availability
range of use or accessibility of data software or computer programs and any
business interruption losses resulting from such loss or damage.
CONDITIONS
1) Interpretation
This Policy and the Schedule shall be read together as one contract and any
word or expression to which a specific meaning has been attached in any
part of this Policy or of the Schedule shall bear such meaning wherever it may
appear.
2) Alterations
The Insured shall give immediate written notice to the Company of any
alteration which materially affects the ricks covered by this Policy.
3)
Basis of Settlement
The Company will pay the cost price following any loss to Sample and Trade
Stocks under Sub-Section B of Section I (including Extensions of Section
I). Claims for other Contents under Sub-Section A of Section I (including
Extensions of Section I) will be settled without deduction for wear tear and
depreciation except claims for clothing shop linen provided that costs have
been incurred only for replacement or reinstatement in a condition similar to
but not better then new.
4) Pair and set Clause
Where any insured item consists of articles in a pair or set this Policy is not
to pay more than the value of any particular part or parts which may be lost
without reference to any special value which such article or articles may have
as part of such pair or set nor more than proportionate part of the insured
value of the pair or set.
5) Average Reinstatement
If in the event of loss or damage the Sum Insured shall be less than the full
value of the property insured the Insured shall be considered as being his/
her own insurer for the difference and shall bear a ratable share of the loss.
The Sum Insured by each and every items of Section I are declared to be
separately subject to this condition. The total amount recoverable in respect
of loss or damage shall not exceed the Sum Insured.
P
6)
Automatic
In the event of loss or damage under Section I the amount payable for
such loss or damage shall be automatically reinstated from the time of the
happening and the Insured shall pay an appropriate additional premium
therefore calculated pro-rate from the date of loss to the expiration of the
Policy.
7)
Precautions
The Insured shall take all ordinary reasonable precautions to prevent accidents
and losses and to comply with all statutory obligations and regulations
imposed by authority.
8) Fraud
If any claim shall be fraudulent or intentionally exaggerated or if any false
declaration or statement shall be made then this Policy shall be void and no
claim be payable.
9) Claims
In the event of any happening which may give rise to a claim under this Policy
(a) the Insured shall give immediate notice thereof in writing to the Company
and shall at his/ her own expense furnish to the Company all such
certificates information and evidence in such form and of such nature as
the Company may reasonably require for the purpose of ascertaining its
liability as soon as possible.
(b) the Company shall not be liable if discovery of loss and notification of
claim is not made by the Insured within 31 days of the occurrence. All
practicable steps shall be taken by the Insured to discover and punish the
guilty person or persons and to trace and recover the property lost. The
Insured shall notify the Police immediately upon discovery of any loss
being the result of burglary.
(c) under Section V or VI the Insured shall notify or forward to the Company
every letter claim writ summons or process immediately on receipt.
(d) under Section V or VI the Insured shall from time to time when required
by the Company submit the injured Employees to be examined by a
registered medical practitioner appointed by the Company. In the case
of death where any reasonable doubt exists as to the cause thereof a
registered medical practitioner appointed by the Company shall be
allowed to make a post-mortem examination of the body of the Employee
at the Company's expenses.
(e) under Section IV or VI the Insured shall ensure that proper medical and
surgical advice is obtained and followed by the Employee affected as
soon as possible after an occurrence.
(f)
under Section V the Insured shall not make any admission of liability
offer promise payment or indemnity without the written consent of the
Company.
10) Salvage
The Company shall have the right to enter the Shop Premises where the
loss or damage has occurred and to take and keep possession of any of the
property insured and to deal with salvage in a reasonable manner. All benefit
under this Policy shall be forfeited if this condition is not observed.
11) Subrogation
The Company shall be entitled to take over and conduct in the name of
the Insured the defence or settlement of any claim against the Insured or
to prosecute in the name of the Insured for its own benefit any claim for
indemnity or damages or otherwise and the Insured shall give all such
information and assistance as the Company may require.
12) Discharge of Liability
At any time after the occurrence of any event giving rise to a claims
against the Insured for which indemnity is provided under Section V or VI
of this Policy the Company may pay to the Insured the full amount of the
Company's liability specified in the relevant section (after the deduction of
any sums already paid) or any lesser amount for which such claim or claims
can be settled and shall relinquish the conduct of any defence settlement or
proceedings relating to such claim or claims shall not thereafter be responsible
for any compensation damage or costs in respect thereof or for any costs
or for nay loss damage or expenses caused to the Insured in consequence
of any act or omission of the Company in connection therewith or of the
Company relinquishing such conduct.
13) Non-transfer of Insured's Rights
Unless otherwise expressly stated nothing contained herein shall give any
rights against the Company to any person other than the Insured. Further
the Company shall not bound by any passing of the interest of the Insured
otherwise than by death or operation of law unless and until the Company
shall by endorsement declare the insurance to be continued. The extension
of the Company's liability in respect of the property or liability of any person
other than Insured shall give no right of claim under this Policy to such person
the intention being that the Insured shall in all case claim for and on behalf
of such person and the receipt of the Insured shall in any case absolutely
discharge the Company's liability under this Policy in respect of such loss.
In the event of the death of the Insured the Company will in respect of any
liability incurred by the Insured under Section V or VI indemnify the Insured's
legal personal representatives in the terms of and subject to the limitations
of the Sections concerned provided that such legal personal representatives
shall as though they were the Insured observe fulfil and be subject to the
terms conditions and exceptions of the Policy so far as they can apply.
14) Jurisdiction
The indemnity under this Policy shall not apply in respect of judgments
which are not in the first instance delivered by or obtained from a court of
competent jurisdiction in Hong Kong.
15) Cancellation
The Company may cancel this Policy by sending seven (7) days' notice by
registered letter to the Insured at his/her last known address and in such
event the Insured shall be entitled to the return of a proportionate part of the
Premium corresponding to the unexpired portion of the Period of Insurance.
The Insured may cancel this Policy by giving the Company seven (7) days"
notice in writing. In such case the Company will retain the customary short
period rate for the time the Policy has been in force and refund the balance to
the Insured provided that no claim has been made during the current Period
Insurance.
6
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requesed to read this Policy. If any error or mis-description be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.

results.content_en:
ere any insured item consists of articles in a pair or set this Policy is not to pay
more than the value of any particular part or parts which may be lost without
reference to any special value which such article or articles may have as part of
such pair or set nor more than a proportionate part of the insured value of the
pair or set.
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requested to read this Policy. If any error or omission be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.
55)
Average
If in the event of loss or Damage the Sum Insured shall be less than the full value
of the property insured the Insured shall be considered as being his own insurer
for the difference and shall bear a ratable share of the loss. The Sum Insured by
each and every items of Section I are declared to be separately subject to this
condition. The total amount recoverable in respect of loss or Damage shall not
exceed the Sum Insured.
6)
Automatic Reinstatement
In the event of loss or Damage under Section I the amount payable for such loss
or Damage shall be automatically reinstated from the time of the happening and
the Insured shall pay an appropriate additional premium therefore calculated
pro-rata from the date of loss to the expiration of the Policy.
7)
Precautions
The Insured shall take all ordinary reasonable precautions to prevent accidents
and losses and to comply with all statutory obligations and regulations imposed
by any authority.
8)
Fraud
If any claim shall be fraudulent or intentionally exaggerated or if any false
declaration or statement shall be made then this Policy shall be void and no
claim be payable.
9) Claims
In the event of any happening which may give rise to a claim under this Policy
(a) the Insured shall give immediate notice thereof in writing to the Company
and shall at his/ her own expense furnish to the Company all such certificates
information and evidence in such form and of such nature as the Company
may reasonably require for the purpose of ascertaining its liability as soon
as possible.
(b) the Company shall not be liable if discovery of loss and notification of claim
is not made by the Insured within 31 days of the occurrence. All practicable
steps shall be taken by the Insured to discover and punish the guilty person
or persons and to trace and recover the property lost. The Insured shall
notify the Police immediately upon discovery of any loss being the result
of burglary.
(c) under Section V or VI the Insured shall notify or forward to the Company
every letter claim writ summons or process immediately on receipt.
(d) under Section IV or VI the Insured shall from time to time when required by
the Company submit the injured Employees to be examined by a registered
medical practitioner appointed by the Company. In the case of death
where any reasonable doubt exists as to the cause thereof a registered
medical practitioner appointed by the Company shall be allowed to make
a post-mortem examination of the body of the Employee at the Company's
expenses.
(e) under Section IV or VI the Insured shall ensure that proper medical and
surgical advice is obtained and followed by the Employee affected as soon
as possible after an occurrence.
(f) under Section V the Insured shall not make any admission of liability offer
promise payment or indemnity without the written consent of the Company.
St
10) Salvage
The Company shall have the right to enter the Office Premises where the loss or
Damage has occurred and to take and keep possession of any of the property
11) Subrogation
The Company shall be entitled to take over and conduct in the name of the
Insured the defence or settlement of any claim against the Insured or to
prosecute in the name of the Insured for its own benefit any claim for indemnity
or Damages or otherwise and the Insured shall give all such information and
assistance as the Company may require.
12) Discharge of Liability
At any time after the occurrence of any event giving rise to a claim or claims
against the Insured for which indemnity is provided under Section Vor VI of this
Policy the Company may pay to the Insured the full amount of the Company's
liability specified in the relevant section (after the deduction of any sums already
paid) or any lesser amount for which such claim or claims can be settled and shall
relinquish the conduct of any defence settlement or proceedings relating to such
claim or claims and shall not thereafter be responsible for any compensation
damages or costs in respect thereof or for any costs or expenses whatsoever
incurred by the Insured after the Company shall have relinquished such conduct
or for any loss Damage or expenses caused to the Insured in consequence of
any act or omission of the Company in connection therewith or of the Company
relinquishing such conduct.
13) Non-transfer of Insured's Rights
Unless otherwise expressly stated nothing contained herein shall give any rights
against the Company to any person other than the Insured. Further the Company
shall not bound by any passing of the interest of the Insured otherwise than by
death or operation of law unless and until the Company shall by endorsement
declare the insurance to be continued. The extension of the Company's liability
in respect of the property or liability of any person other than Insured shall give
no right of claim under this Policy to such person the intention being that the
Insured shall in all cases claim for and on behalf of such person and the receipt of
the Insured shall in any case absolutely discharge the Company's liability under
this Policy in respect of such loss. In the event of the death of the Insured the
Company will in respect of any liability incurred by the Insured under Section
V or VI indemnify the Insured's legal personal representatives in the terms of
and subject to the limitations of the Sections concerned provided that such
legal personal representatives shall as though they were the Insured observe
fulfil and be subject to the terms conditions and exceptions of the Policy so far
as they can apply.
14) Jurisdiction
The indemnity under this Policy shall not apply in respect of judgments which
are not in the first instance delivered by or obtained from a court of competent
jurisdiction in Hong Kong.
15) Cancellation
The Company may cancel this Policy by sending seven (7) days' notice by
registered letter to the Insured at his last known address and in such event the
Insured shall be entitled to the return of a proportionate part of the Premium
corresponding to the unexpired portion of the Period of Insurance.
The Insured may cancel this Policy by giving the Company seven (7) days' notice
in writing. In such case the Company will retain the customary short period rate
for the time the Policy has been in force and refund the balance to the Insured
provided that no claim has been made during the current Period of Insurance.
16) Arbitration
All differences arising out of this Policy shall be referred to the decision of an
Arbitrator to be appointed in writing by the parties in difference or if they
cannot agree upon a single Arbitrator to the decision of two Arbitrators one to
be appointed by each of the parties in writing or in case the Arbitrators do not
agree to the decision of an Umpire appointed by the Arbitrators in writing before
entering upon the reference and the making of the award shall be a condition
precedent to any liability of the Company or any right of action against the
Company in respect of any claim.
17) Other Insurances
If at the time of the happening of any occurrence covered by this Policy (except
for the benefit of Section IV) there is any other existing insurance covering the
same liability or any part thereof the Company shall not be liable to pay or
contribute more than its ratable proportion of any sum payable in respect of
such occurrence.
18) Third Party Right
A person or entity who is not a party to this Policy shall have no rights under the
Contracts (Rights of Third Parties) Ordinance (Cap. 623 of the Laws of Hong
Kong) to enforce any terms of this Policy.
6
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requested to read this Policy. If any error or omission be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.

請盡量提供齊全資料(例如在未能回憶確實日期的情況下提供年份及月份)以便作出公平核保決定。
Important Note: If necessary, please use 'Supplementary Information Form'. 注意:如有需要,請用「補充資料表格」補充。
Part 5 第五部分 Declaration and Authorization 聲明及授權
I / We, the Life Assured / Policyowner, authorize all of the following (1) any doctors, hospitals, clinics, insurance companies, employers, organizations and
persons (that have any medical history or records or knowledge of me / us whom or which I / we have attended or may hereafter attend) may disclose such
information to the Company for the purpose of assessing and processing this application form and claims and providing subsequent services. To avoid any
uncertainty, this authorization shall bind all my / our successors, assignees, executors and administrators and shall remain valid notwithstanding my / our
death or incapacity (including but not limited to mental incapacity). A photocopy of this authorization shall be deemed to be valid as the original; (2) the
Company or any of its appointed medical examiners or laboratories may perform all the necessary medical assessment and tests to underwrite and evaluate
the health status of myself / ourselves in relation to this application form and any claim arising therefrom.
Applicable to Voluntary Health Insurance Scheme ("VHIS") Plan only
I/We, the Life Assured/Policyowner, hereby declare and agree that: (1) any change or revival of the policy shall be subject to the approval by Prudential Hong
Kong Limited ("the Company") and shall not commence until an endorsement in respect of such change or revival of policy ("Endorsement") has been issued
to me/us; (2) this questionnaire collects health-related information solely for the purpose of underwriting which is a process for the Company to evaluate
the health risk of the applicants and decide the application results. The underwriting process that the Company adopts should be fair and reasonable, and
the Company should explain the Endorsement application results if requested by me/us; (3) as the applicant, I/we are required to provide the Company with
complete and accurate information requested in this questionnaire to the best of my/our knowledge and belief. Based on the information provided, the
Company may have follow-up questions or enquiries that require me/us to provide further information for underwriting purpose. Information given herein
are true and shall be the basis of the contract; (4) if there are any changes to or updates of the information provided in this questionnaire after the time of
submission of this Endorsement application and before I/we receive the Endorsement, I/we are required to notify the Company in a timely manner; (5) even
after an Endorsement has been issued upon successful application, the insurance coverage for me/us may be affected or Endorsement and / or the policy
may be terminated, voided or rescinded, or claims may be repudiated by the Company, if I/we have not provided the Company with complete and accurate
information to the best of my/our knowledge and belief according to (3), or if I/we have not notified the Company on any changes to or updates of the
information in time according to (4); (6) in the event of doubt as to whether a fact or information is material it should be disclosed to the Company in this
application form.
Applicable to any basic plan or rider other than Voluntary Health Insurance Scheme ("VHIS") Plan
I / We, the Life Assured / Policyowner, hereby declare and agree that: (1) any change or revival of the policy shall be subject to the approval by Prudential
Hong Kong Limited ("the Company") and shall not commence until an endorsement in respect of such change or revival of policy ("Endorsement") has been
issued to me / us by the Company; (2) neither material fact nor information has been withheld by me / us and the facts and information given herein are true
and shall be the basis of the contract; (3) my / our failure to disclose a material fact or information which may influence the assessment and acceptance of
the application for change or revival of the policy by the Company, may render the Endorsement and / or the contract voidable; (4) I / we shall disclose to the
Company any change in my / our health or insurability (for Policyowner, it is only applicable if payor benefit is applied) after signing the proposal until I / we
receive the Endorsement; (5) in the event of doubt as to whether a fact or information is material, it should be disclosed to the Company in this application
form.

Name of doctor who treated the disease / sickness / medical condition / sign and symptom
治療有關疾病/不適/健康狀況/病徵及症狀的醫生姓名
7.
Name of Hospital, where applicable
醫院名稱(如適用)
Please provide information as detailed as possible (e.g. provide year and month if exact date could not be recalled) for the sake of fair assessment in underwriting.
請盡量提供齊全資料(例如在未能回憶確實日期的情況下提供年份及月份)以便作出公平核保決定。
Important Note: If necessary, please use 'Supplementary Information Form'. 注意:如有需要,請用「補充資料表格」補充。
Part 5 第五部分 Declaration and Authorization 聲明及授權
I / We, the Life Assured / Policyowner, authorize all of the following (1) any doctors, hospitals, clinics, insurance companies, employers, organizations and
persons (that have any medical history or records or knowledge of me / us whom or which I / we have attended or may hereafter attend) may disclose such
information to the Company for the purpose of assessing and processing this application form and claims and providing subsequent services. To avoid any
uncertainty, this authorization shall bind all my / our successors, assignees, executors and administrators and shall remain valid notwithstanding my / our
death or incapacity (including but not limited to mental incapacity). A photocopy of this authorization shall be deemed to be valid as the original; (2) the
Company or any of its appointed medical examiners or laboratories may perform all the necessary medical assessment and tests to underwrite and evaluate
the health status of myself / ourselves in relation to this application form and any claim arising therefrom.
Applicable to Voluntary Health Insurance Scheme ("VHIS") Plan only
I/We, the Life Assured/Policyowner, hereby declare and agree that: (1) any change or revival of the policy shall be subject to the approval by Prudential Hong
Kong Limited ("the Company") and shall not commence until an endorsement in respect of such change or revival of policy ("Endorsement") has been issued
to me/us; (2) this questionnaire collects health-related information solely for the purpose of underwriting which is a process for the Company to evaluate
the health risk of the applicants and decide the application results. The underwriting process that the Company adopts should be fair and reasonable, and
the Company should explain the Endorsement application results if requested by me/us; (3) as the applicant, I/we are required to provide the Company with
complete and accurate information requested in this questionnaire to the best of my/our knowledge and belief. Based on the information provided, the
Company may have follow-up questions or enquiries that require me/us to provide further information for underwriting purpose. Information given herein
are true and shall be the basis of the contract; (4) if there are any changes to or updates of the information provided in this questionnaire after the time of
submission of this Endorsement application and before I/we receive the Endorsement, I/we are required to notify the Company in a timely manner; (5) even
after an Endorsement has been issued upon successful application, the insurance coverage for me/us may be affected or Endorsement and / or the policy
may be terminated, voided or rescinded, or claims may be repudiated by the Company, if I/we have not provided the Company with complete and accurate
information to the best of my/our knowledge and belief according to (3), or if I/we have not notified the Company on any changes to or updates of the
information in time according to (4); (6) in the event of doubt as to whether a fact or information is material it should be disclosed to the Company in this
application form.
Applicable to any basic plan or rider other than Voluntary Health Insurance Scheme ("VHIS") Plan
I / We, the Life Assured / Policyowner, hereby declare and agree that: (1) any change or revival of the policy shall be subject to the approval by Prudential
Hong Kong Limited ("the Company") and shall not commence until an endorsement in respect of such change or revival of policy ("Endorsement") has been
issued to me / us by the Company; (2) neither material fact nor information has been withheld by me / us and the facts and information given herein are true
and shall be the basis of the contract; (3) my / our failure to disclose a material fact or information which may influence the assessment and acceptance of
the application for change or revival of the policy by the Company, may render the Endorsement and / or the contract voidable; (4) I / we shall disclose to the
Company any change in my / our health or insurability (for Policyowner, it is only applicable if payor benefit is applied) after signing the proposal until I / we
receive the Endorsement; (5) in the event of doubt as to whether a fact or information is material, it should be disclosed to the Company in this application
form.

results.content_en:
Company alleges that by reason
of this Exception any accident loss damage expense liability or bodily injury is
not covered by this Insurance the burden of proving the contrary shall be upon
the Insured.
In the event any portion of this Exception is found to be invalid or unenforceable
the remainder shall in full force an effect.
4
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requesed to read this Policy. If any error or mis-description be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.3) in respect of any accident loss damage expense liability or bodily injury directly
or indirectly arising out of
i) biological or chemical contamination
ii)
missiles bombs grenades explosives
due to any act of terrorism.
For the purpose of this Exception an act of terrorism means an act including
but not limited to the use of force or violence and/ or the threat thereof of
any person or group(s) of persons whether acting alone or on behalf of or
in connection with any organization(s) or government 9S) committed for
political religious ideological or ethnic purposes or reasons including the
intention to influence any government and/ or to put the public or any section
of the public in fear.
4) any accident loss damage expense liability or bodily injury directly or indirectly
caused by or arising from or in consequence or contributed to
i)
ionizing radiations or contamination by radioactivity from any nuclear
fuel or from any nuclear waste from the combustion of nuclear fuel solely
for the purpose of this Exception shall include any self-sustaining process
of nuclear fission
ii) nuclear weapons material.
5)
consequential loss of any kind except as provided in Section II.
6)
In respect of any loss of or damage to the Property (Applicable to SECTION I,
II and III) directly or indirectly caused by resulting from or in connection with
any of the following:
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary within this Policy, this insurance
excludes any loss, damage, liability, claim, cost or expense of whatsoever
nature, directly or indirectly caused by, contributed to by, resulting from,
arising out of, or in connection with a Communicable Disease or the fear or
threat (whether actual or perceived) of a Communicable Disease regardless
of any other cause or event contributing concurrently or in any other sequence
thereto.
7) In respect of any of the following cover:
· personal accident and/ or the consequential loss cost claim or expenses
(Applicable to SECTION IV)/ any third party liability or any associated
costs and expense (Applicable to SECTION V)
as so provided in the Policy directly or indirectly caused by resulting from or in
connection with any of the following:
Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary, this insurance excludes any
loss, damage, liability, expense, fines, penalties or any other amount directly or
indirectly caused by, in connection with, or in any way involving or arising out
of any of the following including any fear or threat thereof, whether actual or
perceived:
· Coronavirus (COVID-19) including any mutation or variation thereof; or
. any declaration, categorisation, characterisation, reference to or in any
other way communication as an epidemic or pandemic by the World
Health Organisation or other governmental or quasi-governmental public
health agency, entity or service that may make such declaration.
8) Notwithstanding any provision to the contrary within this Insurance or any
endorsement thereto it is agreed that Company shall not be deemed to
provide cover and the Company shall not be liable to pay any claim or provide
any benefit hereunder to the extent that the provision of such cover payment
of such claim or provision of such benefit would expose the Company to any
sanction prohibition or restriction under United Nations resolutions or the
trade or economic sanctions laws of the European Union United Kingdom or
United States of America.
DEFINITIONS
“Insured"
SH
The party named as the Insured in the Schedule and no others.
"Business"
The usual work and activities carried on by the Insured pertaining to his/ her
business as specified in the Schedule and no others.
"Shop Premises"
The premises occupied by the Insured as a shop at the situation shown in the
Schedule at which the Business of the Insured as specified in the Schedule is
transacted and is all built of brick store and roofed with concrete.
"Communicable Disease"
Means any disease which can be transmitted by means of any substance or agent
from any organism to another organism where:
i)
the substance or agent includes, but is not limited to, a virus, bacterium,
parasite or other organism or any variation thereof, whether deemed living or
not, and
ii) the method of transmission, whether direct or indirect, includes but is not
limited to, airborne transmission, bodily fluid transmission, transmission from
or to any surface or object, solid, liquid or gas or between organisms, and
iii) the disease, substance or agent can cause or threaten damage to human
health or human welfare or can cause or threaten damage to, deterioration of,
loss of value of, marketability of or loss of use of property.
"Contents"
Contents belonging to the Insured or for which the Insured is legally responsible all
used in connection with the Business and contained in the Shop Premises including
but not limited to
1.
any telephone installation gas and electricity meters
2.
interior decorations and improvements made by the Insured
3.
landlord's fixtures and fittings wallpapers ceilings panellings and the like but
only to the extent for which the Insured is legally liable to the landlord as
tenant.
but excluding Sample and Trade Stocks.
"Sample and Trade Stocks"
Stocks in trade and as sample belonging to the Insured or for which the Insured
is legally responsible all pertaining to and normally pertaining to the Business and
contained in the Shop Premises.
"Personal Effects"
Property of personal use normally worn or used and in either case carried about the
person in everyday life but excluding Money spectacles and contact lenses.
"Employee"
Any person in the employ of the Insured as defined in the Employees' Compensation
Ordinance.
"Money"
Cash currency notes bank-notes postal and money orders cheques negotiable
instruments postage and revenue stamps not forming part of a stamp collection
travel tickets and luncheon vouchers all pertaining to the Business and belonging
to the Insured.
"Business Hours
The usual hours during which the Insured transacts Business at the Shop Premises
and during which the Insured the Insured's partners directors or Employees
normally entrusted with Money shall be actually in or on the Shop Premises.
"Permanent Total Disablement"
Absolute disablement from engaging in or giving attention to any gainful
occupation for twelve calendar months and at the end of that time being beyond
hope of improvement.
"Loss of Limb"
Loss by physical severance or total and permanent loss of use of a hand at or above
the wrist or of a foot at or above the ankle.
"Accident"
For the purpose of Section VI accident means an accident means an accident or a
series of accidents arising out of one event.
“Disease"
A disease contracted by an Employee of the Insured as a result of his/her exposure
to the nature of his/ her employment with the Insured. Such exposure may extend
over a period of time of which period may fall outside the Period of Insurance
under this Policy.
"Earnings"
All gross wages salaries remunerations commissions bonuses overtime termination
payments allowances and the like director's fees or other benefits whether at
piecework rate or otherwise and whether paid in cash or in kind by the Insured to
his/her Employees.
"Noise-Induced Deafness"
Has the same meaning as assigned to that expression in the Occupational Deafness
(Compensation) Ordinance (Chapter 469 of the laws of Hong Kong).
"Ordinance"
The Employees' Compensation Ordinance (Chapter 282 of the laws of Hong Kong)
"Pneumoconiosis and Mesothelioma"
Have the same meaning as assigned to those expressions in the Pneumoconiosis
and Mesothelioma (Compensation) Ordinance (Chapter 360 of the laws of Hong
Kong).
"Geographical Area"
For the purpose of Section VI geographical area means the territory of Hong Kong.
IMPORTANT - the Insured is requesed to read this Policy. If any error or mis-description be found, the Policy should be returned to the issuing Office for correction.
5

results.title_name_en: PRUchoice Maid
results.title_name_tc: 保誠精選「僱傭寶」
results.content_en:
PRUDENTIAL
英 國 保 誠
用心聆聽
實現您心
NUK 4
保誠精選「僱傭寶」–陪月員計劃
家居
PRUDENTIAL
英 國 保 誠
Listening. Understanding. Delivering.
NUK Y
PRUChoice Maid Insurance -
Post-natal Carer Plan
HOMEPRUChoice Maid Insurance -
Post-natal Carer Plan
"Postpartum confinement" has been a Chinese tradition since ancient
times, with a set of diet and lifestyle restriction practiced after birth in
order to restore the mother's body. With the help of a 'post-natal carer',
to prepare confinement meals, help take care of the newborn, assist
breastfeeding and support the mom in every way has become a
common practice in Hong Kong. Therefore, Prudential General
Insurance Hong Kong Limited ("Prudential") is pleased to offer you
PRUChoice Maid Insurance - Post-natal Carer Plan, a comprehensive
plan which allows you to meet the legal obligation as an employer and to
provide an extra protection to your family and post-natal carer.
(Applicable on or after 10 December, 2021)
Special Features
1
This plan provides coverage for your post-natal carer with a flexibility
of 1, 2- or 3-months coverage.
2
In case your post-natal carer is hospitalised due to accidental injury
in the course of his/ her employment with you, a daily cash subsidy
is provided for the interruption in service.
3
Post-natal carer Personal Liability protects you from legal liability
accrued from his/ her negligence while performs his/ her duty with
you.
4
We will compensate you up to 100% of the monthly earnings of your
post-natal carer that you are liable to pay under Employees'
Compensation for his/ her temporary incapacity.
Insurance Cover at a Glance
Plan Features
Maximum
Limits (HK$)
Employees' Compensation
100,000,000/
event
Protects you against liability under the Employees'
Compensation Ordinance and Common Law for
damages, cost and expenses if your post-natal carer
suffers injury or disease arising out of and in the
course of his/ her employment.
Post-natal Carer Personal Liability
Protects you against your legal liability as the
employer in respect of third-party bodily injury and/
or property damage arising out of negligence of the
post-natal carer for performing newborn baby care
and/ or post-natal mother care in the course of
employment in Hong Kong.
100,000/
policy term
Post-natal Carer Hospital Cash Subsidy
Pay a daily benefit to employer if one suffers from an
interruption of service due to hospitalisation of your
post-natal carer from the third day of such
hospitalisation in Hong Kong, provided there is a
valid claim under Section 1 - Employees'
Compensation, limit to 5 days subsidy.
1,000/
policy term,
200/ day
Flexible Change of Post-natal Carer
If you change your post-natal Carer during the period of insurance,
coverage can be transferred to the new post-natal carer at no cost
provided that prior notification in writing is made and accepted by
Prudential. You may simply register and login to your myPrudential
account with your mobile phone or computer to amend.
Main Exclusions
The following is a summary of major exclusions to PRUChoice Maid
Insurance - Post-natal Carer Plan. Please refer to the policy for complete
details.
General Exclusions applicable to All Sections
· War and kindred risks, government acts, nuclear hazard and civil
commotion
· Pregnancy miscarriage, infertility treatment or childbirth or
complications thereof
· Willful malicious or unlawful act
· Loss of or damage to third party liability arising from COVID-19 or
pandemic
Exclusions Post-natal Carer Personal Liability
· Property belonging to or held in custody or control of the insured or
the insured's family members and relatives, post-natal carer or their
family members
· Any occurrence outside Hong Kong
Exclusions Post-natal Carer Hospital Cash Subsidy
· Pre-existing medical conditions
· Pulmonary tuberculosis, geriatric nursing, cosmetic surgery and eye
refraction including eye tests or any costs of fitting of spectacles
· General body check-up, convalescence or rest care
Important Note
1. This insurance is only applicable to post-natal carer who is aged
18-65 and mainly performs baby care, post-natal mother care and/
or simple housework for applicant.
2. Only employer of the post-natal carer can be the policyholder for
PRUChoice Maid Insurance - Post-natal Carer Plan. This Policy
cannot be purchased by post-natal carer Agency or Company.
3. In any event, no refund of premium is allowed in the event of
cancellation of the Post-natal Carer Plan.
4. The Company shall have the right to alter the Premium Table and
the terms and conditions of this Policy from time to time without
notice.
